title.rendered: “IDF Apprehends Terrorist Behind Recent Stabbing Incident Near Rantis Village: A Detailed Account”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces captured the terrorist who carried out the stabbing attack at the gas station near the village of Rantis

A terrorist carried out a stabbing attack a short while ago at a gas station near the village of Rantis in the Ephraim Regional Brigade’s territory. A reservist IDF soldier was moderately injured as a result of the stabbing and opened fire at the terrorist. Additional forces initiated a pursuit of the terrorist and blocked routes in the area.

During the search in the area of the village of Rantis, the forces captured the terrorist suspected of carrying out the attack.

IDF forces provided first medical treatment to the soldier at the scene and he was evacuated to receive medical care at a hospital. His family was updated.
